description:
This course is targeted to caregivers and professionals who work with Type 4 hair. This is the coarse and coily hair that often shrinks when wet. Volume 2 leads the learner through important hair care tasks. The course includes demonstrations for the three most common challenges in hair care: shampooing, conditioning, and detangling.

The course can be completed in one sitting and reviewed prior to your own implementation of techniques.

Contents Include:

  • Shampooing
  • Conditioning
  • Detangling
  • Air Drying & Blow Drying
  • Moisturizing & Oils
  • Manipulation, Hair Tools, & Styling

Why Take This Course?

  • Do you have Type 4 (Coarse & Coily) Hair?
  • Do you want to know more about your hair?
  • Are you curious about Type 4 hair care skills?
  • Are you taking care of child or client with Type 4 Hair?

If you answered yes to any of the questions above, this course would be useful for you.
title: Black Hair Care Volume 2: Care, Detangling, and Styling
